trans-unit.source:
\n

Describes the current state of the connection to a data source.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xx x xxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The connection to the data source is broken.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source: This can occur only after the connection has been opened.
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxx xxxxx xxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source: A connection in this state may be closed and then re-opened.
trans-unit.target: X xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxx xxxxx xxx xx xxxxxx xxx xxxx xx$xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
(This value is reserved for future versions of the product.)

\n
trans-unit.target: $Xxxx xxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx.$ $$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The connection object is connecting to the data source.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The connection object is executing a command.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx x xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
(This value is reserved for future versions of the product.)

\n
trans-unit.target: $Xxxx xxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx.$ $$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
(This value is reserved for future versions of the product.)

\n
trans-unit.target: $Xxxx xxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx.$ $$x$$x
